          \u003Ca href=\u0022\/course\/alzheimers-disease\u0022 class=\u0022course_summary_h\u0022\u003EThis course will provide an update of the rapidly accumulating knowledge of Alzheimer\u2019s, highlighting what clinicians need to know about diagnosis, current standards of treatment, and the future of Alzheimer\u2019s care.\u003C\/a\u003E\n        \u003C\/div\u003E\n        \n
